function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fear of infection leading to absenteeism among nurses","Impact":"Shortage of nursing staff, leading to reduced patient care and increased workload on remaining staff","Mitigation":"Provide proper protective equipment, regular testing, and psychological support to nurses","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment, testing kits, mental health apps","People":"Nursing staff","Owner":"Hospital administrators and management"},{"Description":"Infections among nurses due to exposure","Impact":"Spread of disease within the healthcare facility and risk of severe illness or death among nurses","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control protocols, provide training on best practices, and ensure availability of protective equipment","Technologies":"Infection control software, training modules, supply chain management systems","People":"Nursing staff, hospital support staff","Owner":"Hospital administrators, infection control teams"},{"Description":"Psychological problems among nurses","Impact":"Decreased morale, increased turnover, and compromised patient care due to emotional distress among nurses","Mitigation":"Establish support programs, foster positive relationships, and provide education on managing stress and anxiety","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health resources, virtual support groups","People":"Nursing staff, hospital management","Owner":"Human resources, nursing leadership"}]}
